column1: Little Goat Diner////You will not go wrong with the bulls eye French toast - a combination of sweet and savory dish. This is a place where in there's the fusion of American and Asian dishes also. The goat dishes are cooked nicely without any tangy taste. If you are a type of person who loves to try and be adventurous with your food
column2: this is the right place to go. For those who wants to play it safe but with the company of people who are adventurous with food - you can also enjoy their Mac and cheese
column3: their chicken or their all American burger. A place that will satisfy both adventurous and non-adventurous food lovers.
